intended_purpose.description: Indicates the type of production in which this work was used. These values reside in the Intended Purpose Table. Cannot be “GEN”.

production_title.description: Name of the production in which this work was used.

production_number.description: The number generated by the production company to identify the work.

Episode_Title.description: Title of the episode from which this work originated.

Episode_Number.description: Number assigned to the episode by the producer.

Year_of_Production.description: The year in which the production of the film or episode was completed.

V-ISAN.description: V-ISAN unique identifier for audio-visual production in which this work is first used

Version_Name.description: The title or description of the particular version to which the specific ISAN or EIDR relates.
